articles.author: Gabrielle Fonrouge
articles.title: More Americans are financing groceries with buy now, pay later loans — and more are paying those bills late, survey says - CNBC
articles.description: Consumers are using buy now, pay later plans to pay for essentials such as groceries, as concerns around the economy grow.
articles.content:
A growing number of Americans are using buy now, pay later loans to buy groceries, and more people are paying those bills late, according to new Lending Tree data released Friday. 
The figures are t… [+3376 chars]
